entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Missing API] BindingContext missing in IView #28526
  • Raise event Always user tap a row in collectionview #28525
  • [CarouselViewHandler2] CurrentItem does not work when PeekAreaInsets is set #28524
  • [CarouselView] Different behavior on iOS and Android when Loop = False #28523
  • [Documentation issue] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) #28517
    Backlog
  • Bind ListView.IsRefreshing is not work. #28514
    Backlog
  • .NET 9 project template with sample content has chinese characters instead of icons #28512
    Backlog
  • [Question] .NET 9 MAUI sample app with sample content async lock for DisplayAlert (why?) #28511
    Backlog
  • GroupHeaderTemplate and GroupFooterTemplate Not Displaying in CollectionView(CV2) #28509
    Backlog
  • To build this project, the following workloads must be installed: maui-android #28508
    Backlog
  • Crash on startup with iOS Release #28520
    Backlog
  • Header/Footer Template and View Synchronization Issue in .NET MAUI CollectionView (CV2) #28504
    Backlog
  • Log - Missing Fonts report #28502
    Backlog
  • dotnet publish command for MAUi App (.NET 9) is giving MSB1008 error - Only one folder can be specified #28498
  • [iOS] ShellContent + DataTemplate + Binding => crash #28497
  • [Android] Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background #28492

Closed

  • Flickering when transitioning pages in iOS using TabBar menu #28505
    Backlog
  • DisplayAlert / DisplayActionSheet / DisplayPromptAsync inconsistent Async suffix #6720
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] ListView not displaying model property #28503
  • System Theme Inconsistency on iOS 18 when Resuming from Background With Alert (DisplayAlert) #28501
  • Drag & drop between two windows of a single application #12510
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background - Fix #28522
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-modal
  • [Documentation] Page.DisplayAlert wrong documentation (Task vs Task<bool>) - fix #28521
    area-docs, community ✨
  • [ci] Update arcade net10.0 #28518
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix Binding for ListView.IsRefreshing #28516
    community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • ViewExtensions Async suffix consistency #28506
    t/breaking 💥, area-animation, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Obsolete ListView and Cell types #28500
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 8 #28496
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Tab Icon #26757
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28477
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28478
    area-templates
  • Make DisplayAlert & DisplayActionSheet more consistent by adding Async #28053
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Remove api check for Android PutString #28482
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28447
    p/0, area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Update dotnet-format-daily-main.yml #28488
    community ✨, area-sfi
  • Make GraphicsViewHandler.MapBackground public #28243
    t/breaking 💥, area-drawing, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    area-core-hosting
  • [2025/03/18] In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    area-core-hosting
  • [.NET 10] More public APIs related with Entry and Editor, pending TODOs #28467
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-entry
  • System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28456
    area-xaml, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    do-not-merge, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Make it safer to set TestCases.HostApp main page #28355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Recover the uitest-build task on Android cake #28452
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the flyout icon and content page disappeared when focus on the … #28474
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Shell content title not rendering in Full-Screen Mode on MacCatalyst #28468
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix IsPresented property not updating correctly in FlyoutPage #28471
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28485
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] Fixed the EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate issues in CollectionView #28472
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Make tests depending on GC less flaky #28489
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix App freezes when Background property is set to OnPlatform Color DynamicResource #27444
    t/bug, area-drawing
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area-controls-window
  • [Android] Fixed DragGestureRecognizer.DropCompleted event not firing #28466

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion

    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed VisualState Setters not working properly for CollectionView [Windows] #27230
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows, Android] Resolved issue with dynamic Header/Footer reassignment in CollectionView. #28403
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Shadows #27701
